itunes:title: Episode 1091 - Former Trump Campaign Chairman Paul Manafort
title: Episode 1091 - Former Trump Campaign Chairman Paul Manafort
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Former Trump presidential campaign chair Paul Manafort joins the show to talk about his time in prison, what it's like watching the FBI raid your house, why he was prosecuted in the first place, the FBI raid on Mar-a-Lago, if he still talks to Trump, and...
itunes:summary:
Former Trump presidential campaign chair Paul Manafort joins the show to talk about his time in prison, what it's like watching the FBI raid your house, why he was prosecuted in the first place, the FBI raid on Mar-a-Lago, if he still talks to Trump, and whether or not he thinks Donald Trump is running for president in 2024.
